b.inggris.text:
question tag form = jika kalimatnya positif, maka tanyanya negatif
                          = jika kalimatnya negatif, maka tanyanya positif
contoh = she is going to school, isn't she?
           = she isn't going to school, is she?
----------------------- TO BE
I, am (+ aren't I)
SHE HE IT, is
YOU THEY WE, are

I SHE HE IT, was
YOU THEY WE, were

-----------------------------------AUX
I YOU THEY WE, do (V1)
HE SHE IT, does (V1)
ALL SUBJECT, did (V2 / V3)
-----------------------------------MODAL
CAN ,COULD, MAY, MIGHT, SHOULD, SHALL, WOULD

---------------------------------------EXAMPLE
(AUX)
i'm going to school, arent i?
you going to supermarket, dont you?
the car didnt walk, did it?
